column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Although I loved the atmosphere
column3: I was very disappointed with the lobster paella. The presentation was beautiful
column4: but the lobster was on the dry side and a little chewy
column5: and the rice in the paella was hard and overall on the greasy side. I took two bites of it and that was about it. My friend that was with me that travels to Spain every year
column6: agreed that the rice was hard. We also expected the lobster to be in the paella and not served in the shell. Our server was fantastic
column8: I was a little disappointed that the manager didn't come to our table after we let our server know how we felt. I will give this place another shot and perhaps try different tapas. The sangria was quite nice.
